Infiniti G37 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Infiniti G37 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Infiniti G37 changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Infiniti G37 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

In the midst of the economic crisis it was decided: We are bringing a new car market to Europe. And we are going against BMW and Mercedes. In fact, the new brand has arrived, it's called Infiniti, and their cars make at least a lot of visual appearance. Infiniti is also not someone, the brand has been successful in the US for years, and behind it stands the Japanese manufacturer Nissan. That does not mean much, however, since Lexus, the luxury division of Toyota, has been particularly hard hit the ground in Germany for 20 years.

The first thing to appreciate is the courage that the responsible people at Nissan had, for it would not be a good idea to convince the Europeans, especially the Germans, of cars like the 48.800 Euro G37 S. The 4.66 meter long car is aimed at the BMW 3 Series Coupé and is technically starting from the Nissan 370 Z. From this sports car take over all G models Infinitis, also the sedan, the engine: a 3.7 liter V6 cylinder.

Why he has 328 hp in the Infiniti but only 320, does not even open up to psychologically trained drivers - to feel such a difference is not at all. What is more noticeable is the weight loss of the Infiniti: It weighs well 150 kilos more than the more compact Nissan. It costs him in the acceleration only about half a second (5.9 instead of 5.3 seconds from zero to speed 60), but when cornering the driver of the G37 S is more exposed to the centrifugal forces.

On the other hand, the Infiniti has its all-wheel steering, a special feature with rear-wheel drive and only in the S-equipment. It brings noticeable life into the car: If one looks at the steering wheel only obliquely, the G37 S seems already to dash into the curve - the accusation that one had against BMW a too indirect steering, the Infiniti engineers wanted to under no circumstances make ,

You need a few days of habituation, until you can easily and fluently deal with the G37 S, initially the car seems rather nervous. This impression is also supported by the 19-inch wheels with their wide low-profile tires (front 225/40, rear 245/40): the Infiniti is spurring, and for a Gran Turismo, it is a trail too hard. However, in the S-version against 4100 euros surcharge is not synonymous with the sports gear.

But in the face of the tight space on the rear seats, it is perhaps only consistent to order the landing gear from the attack department: the car is quite like driving alone, the power of the engine is more appreciated when no passenger makes critical remarks , Excellent power output, adequate sound and a well-ordered seven-speed automatic transmission with shift paddles on the steering wheel suggest that you never need another drive source in your life. Only 13.5 liters of daily consumption (EU standard: 10.5) must be taken.
